triplets: Flexible object used as a toy or decoration, capable of being inflated with air or gas
Decoration for events and parties, recreational play, promotional displays, and celebrations
Rubber, latex, or foil materials that can expand when filled with air, helium, or other gases
Valve or neck used for inflating and sealing the balloon
Available in a wide range of colors, patterns, and printed designs depending on manufacturer
Party decorations, celebration setups, event displays, and toy collections
Various manufacturers producing party supplies, promotional materials, and novelty items
Typically 5–50 grams depending on size, material, and whether inflated
Typically 20–30 cm when fully inflated, varying with type and intended use
Short-lived; generally lasts a few hours to several days depending on inflation method, material, and environmental conditions
